title: Adjust e2e simultaneous load to exceed available stock
description: Compute simultaneous buy load from DB counts (users * 30% of products) and force attempts above available inventory to verify no oversell.

title: Add automated test cases for frontend app
description: Set up a test runner and add initial unit/integration test cases for core frontend behavior (utils + cart store), then document how to run tests.

title: Add full-flow API sale test and report
description: Implement integration test that runs create order through payment flow and persists a sale result report artifact for review.

title: preview.mp4 size change on scroll, fix it, if video ended add hover effect and replay button
close_reason: Stabilized preview sizing and replay UX

title: Code-split large frontend chunks
description: Vite build warns some chunks >500kB after minification (notably maplibre-gl). Consider dynamic imports/manualChunks to reduce initial load, especially on landing pages.

title: Auto-seed 10 iPhones when none exist in e2e test
description: Update sale flow e2e test to insert 10 iPhone products and inventory when iPhone seeded count is zero.

title: Analyze iPhone seed inventory and add high-concurrency test
description: Based on docs/README.md and DB seed files, document how many iPhone products are seeded and add automated concurrency test coverage for e-commerce inventory/order behavior under concurrent requests.

title: Enhance sale flow e2e with seeded iPhone count and concurrent buys
description: Update TestE2E_OrderToPaymentFlow_GeneratesSaleReport to query DB for seeded iPhone count and run simultaneous buy scenario sized by iPhone seeds * 30% of users; include results in report.

title: E2E sell out full product inventory
description: Modify sale flow e2e test to continue concurrent purchasing rounds until selected product available inventory reaches zero, with guardrails and reporting.

title: Remove rollback logic from e2e iPhone seeding
description: Update sale flow e2e seeding helper to avoid transaction rollback semantics and keep direct inserts.

title: Use random 1-100 iPhone seed count when none exist
description: Update sale flow e2e test: when iPhone count is zero, seed a random number of iPhone products between 1 and 100 instead of fixed 10.
